scripts.build: npm install && del-cli ./build/index.js && esbuild index.js --bundle --platform=node --outdir=build --external:"@aws-sdk/*" && cd ./build && bestzip function.zip . -x function.zip -q -r --filesync && cd ..
scripts.deploy-dev: npm run build && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name castofly_slackFeedback --zip-file fileb://build/function.zip --no-cli-pager --profile development
